sql-statements.statement: SELECT oce.modifier,oce.name FROM offering_catalog_entry oce, offering_catalog oc WHERE oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oc.catalog_id = 'OTHER' AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.catalog_type = 5 AND UPPER(oce.modifier) = ? AND rownum <= 250 ORDER BY name

SELECT oce.modifier,oce.name FROM offering_catalog_entry oce, offering_catalog oc WHERE oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oc.catalog_id = 'OTHER' AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.catalog_type = 5 AND UPPER(oce.modifier) LIKE ? AND rownum <= 250 ORDER BY name

SELECT oce.modifier,oce.name FROM offering_catalog_entry oce, offering_catalog oc WHERE oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oc.catalog_id = 'OTHER' AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.catalog_type = 5 AND UPPER(oce.name) = ? AND rownum <= 250 ORDER BY name

SELECT oce.modifier,oce.name FROM offering_catalog_entry oce, offering_catalog oc WHERE oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oc.catalog_id = 'OTHER' AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.catalog_type = 5 AND UPPER(oce.name) LIKE ? AND rownum <= 250 ORDER BY name
